HPI 8036 Lancia Delta S4 1986 Rallye Monte Carlo Winner H. Toivonen/S. Cresto

25th WRC win for Lancia
2nd WRC win for Delta S4
3rd WRC win for Henri Toivonen

The 1986 WRC season was shaping up to be the most exciting seasons yet with all of the major manufacturers entering their Group B cars in the championship. Henri Toivonen & Sergio Cresto kicked off the season with a decisive win in the first rally of the year - Monte Carlo. They led for 30 of the 36 stages and beat the Peugeot team that was dominant in 1985. After some fatal accidents involving the Group B monsters, the FIA announced the end of Group B later in the season. This would be Toivonen's last win before his & Cersto's death four months later in Corsica.
